version_description: - Bugfix
- small bug fixes

We have a new amazing 1.1.1 version of the Jumia Food app
available for you! Discover what changed:

• Performance and stability improvements

We have a new amazing 1.1.2 version of the Jumia Food app
available for you! Discover what changed:

• Performance and stability improvements

We have a new amazing 1.1.3 version of the Jumia Food app
available for you! Discover what changed:

• New payment methods
• Performance and stability improvements

We have a new amazing 2.0 version of the Jumia Food app available for you! Discover what changed:

• Brand new design for an even better customer experience!
• Floating action button to redirect you to the current order screen when you are browsing the restaurants list!
• Performance and stability improvements

We are looking forward for your feedback! Your feedback and ideas can be reported at food-android-support@jumia.com.

We have a new amazing 2.1.0 version of the Jumia Food app
available for you! Discover what changed:

• Follow your order: You can now follow your order since it's picked up at the restaurant until it's delivered to your home!
• Customer Location: Now you can set the pin for your address based on your GPS location or select your location manually by pinpointing it on the map!
• Performance and stability improvements

We are looking forward for your feedback! Your feedback and ideas
can be reported at mobile.food@jumia.com.

We have a new amazing 2.2.0 version of the Jumia Food app
available for you! Discover what changed:

• Customer support chat!
• Zoom on product images!
• Performance and stability improvements!

We are looking forward for your feedback! Your feedback and ideas
can be reported at mobile.food@jumia.com.

We have a new amazing 2.3.0 version of the Jumia Food app
available for you! Discover what changed:

• New payment method: Jumia Pay!
• Performance and stability improvements!

We are looking forward for your feedback! Your feedback and ideas
can be reported at mobile.food@jumia.com.

We are looking forward for your feedback! Your feedback and ideas

We have a new amazing 2.4 version of the Jumia Food app available for you! Discover what changed:

• Vendor groups! Now you can see your favorite vendors grouped for easy access as well as vendors that deliver with the maximum speed!
• Updated delivery time! Now your order delivery time is updated in real time for your convenience.
• Performance and stability improvements!

We are looking forward for your feedback! Your feedback and ideas can be reported at mobile.food@jumia.com.

We have a new amazing 3.2.0 version of the Jumia Food app available for you! Discover what changed:

Whats new?

- New search available! Now you can search for your product and vendor directly on the vendors list!
- Preorder! You can now set when you want to receive your orders!
- Performance and stability


We are looking forward for your feedback! Your feedback and ideas can be reported at mobile.food@jumia.com.

We have a new amazing 4.0.0 version of the Jumia Food app available for you! Discover what changed:

A brand new app with a new logo and new colours!

It's easier to navigate through the new Jumia Food app version! Whats new?
- a one-step checkout so that you can place your order much faster
- a new state-of-the-art geolocation feature to specify where you want your order to be delivered
- the possibility to let us know how your delivery experience was

We are looking forward for your feedback! Your feedback and ideas can be reported at mobile.food@jumia.com.
